DataListSpec.Name: Get Fundraiser For AppealId Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Gets the fundraiser constituent for the given Appeal.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_GET_FUNDRAISER_FORAPPEAL( @APPEALID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on;
select TEAMFUNDRAISER.CONSTITUENTID from dbo.TEAMFUNDRAISINGTEAMMEMBER inner join dbo.TEAMFUNDRAISER on TEAMFUNDRAISINGTEAMMEMBER.TEAMFUNDRAISERID = TEAMFUNDRAISER.ID left join dbo.APPEAL on APPEAL.ID = TEAMFUNDRAISER.APPEALID where APPEAL.ID = @APPEALID
